name: Nuno Tuuk
content:
Captain Nuno Tuuk was a male Neimoidian who served as the captain of a Trade Federation battleship. He was a member of the Confederacy of Independent Systems. During a raid on his battleship, Tuuk developed a plot with his battle droids, which consisted in drawing the ships' attackers with food and the captain to a compartment protected with ray shields.
Nuno Tuuk appeared in the 2022 videogame LEGO Star Wars: The Skywalker Saga developed by Traveller's Tales. In the game, Tuuk is present when the player finds a trade federation battleship in Geonosis space, the player can choose to raid Tuuk's battleship, and if so, they must defeat the ship's defenses. After the ship has been left defenseless, Tuuk traps the player in a compartment. The player must get out of the compartment, and later may defeat Tuuk, gaining the ability to purchase Tuuk's battleship.
